params._borrowRate: rate for a 1 second interval specified in RAY accuracy.

params._cumulativeRate: the cumulative rate in RAY accuracy.
params._debt: the total debt to be used.

params._borrowRate: rate for a 1 second interval specified in RAY accuracy to be applied
params._cumulativeRate: the initial cumulative rate from which to apply the borrow rate
params._timeElapsed: the time over whicht the borrow rate shall be applied

params._baseDebt: the base debt to be used. Can be a vault base debt or an aggregate base debt
params._cumulativeRate: the cumulative rate in RAY accuracy.

annualizedBorrowRate(uint256).notice: Calculate the annualized borrow rate from the specified borrowing rate.

calculateBaseDebt(uint256,uint256).notice: Calculate the base debt from a specified total debt and cumulative rate.

calculateCumulativeRate(uint256,uint256,.notice: Bring an existing cumulative rate forward in time

calculateDebt(uint256,uint256).notice: Calculate the total debt from a specified base debt and cumulative rate.
